resources.string: " DashBuddy reads information from the Dasher app screen to automatically track your miles, log offer details, and record your earnings. This service never collects passwords or personal information. This permission is required to enable automatic tracking features. "

We make tracking your dashes easier! Interactions in this app happen within its Bubble. In addition to notifications, we also need to ask for some other permissions. Please enable the following services:
Allows DashBuddy to show important alerts and the floating bubble button. After enabling, tap the bubble button in the notification to start the service.
This is the core permission. It allows the app to read screen text from the Dasher app to automatically log offer details, track dash progress, and provide overlays.
Needed to track mileage for tax purposes and to provide accurate delivery time estimates. Your location is only tracked during an active dash.
Required to see new order notifications and tip-added alerts when the Dasher app is in the background. This helps ensure no opportunities are missed.
Your data stays on your device. We never sell your data.
To act as your co-pilot, DashBuddy needs to read Dasher offers as they pop up and tap the screen to accept or decline them based on your rules.

We use Android\'s AccessibilityService. Our engine only looks at the screen when the Dasher app is open. Strict \'Sensitive Screen\' blockers completely shut down our \'eyes\' if you open your bank app or personal texts.
To catch tip updates and other notifications, DashBuddy needs to read your Dasher notifications.
We use the NotificationListenerService to listen *only* for Dasher notifications. We instantly ignore notifications from messages, emails, or other personal apps.
DashBuddy tracks your miles while you are dashing so you can calculate your actual profit after gas and wear-and-tear.
We only ping your GPS while an active Dash is running. Once you hit \'End Dash\', our Odometer shuts down completely to save your battery and protect your privacy.
DashBuddy uses notifications to keep the floating Bubble alive and to alert you of high-paying offers.
This is a standard Android permission to ensure the OS doesn\'t kill the app in the background while you are working. For full functionality, enabling the bubble is recommended!
To show you the math over the DoorDash app, DashBuddy needs permission to pop out into a floating window.
Android heavily restricts floating windows. Please ensure you select "All conversations can bubble" on the next screen so the HUD works automatically!
Look for \'DashBuddy\' and turn it on.
What is your car\'s average MPG? We use this to calculate your actual profit after gas expenses.
What car are you driving? We will automatically look up its fuel efficiency to calculate your true profit.
What are you currently paying per gallon?
Are you cherry-picking for maximum profit, or trying to protect your Platinum/Top Dasher status?
Do you currently accept Red Card shopping orders?
What is the absolute lowest payout you will even look at before declining?
What is your target active hourly wage?
How many miles are you willing to drive for a single order?
